title: Upgrading to 3.9.2 from 3.8.1 Multiple Delete from Multiple datasources in One Transactional throw
body:
### Describe the bug

I am using Panache with PanacheRepository.  
I have multiple DataSources and In some tests, I need to use more than one.  
And so, for the cleanup, I deleteAll of my repository.  
That worked well until the upgrade to 3.9.2.  
Now it throws on the second deleteAll

### Expected behavior

To do all deleteAll without a throw

### Actual behavior

Throw:

### How to Reproduce?

Maven Project that reproduces the error:  
https://github.com/Guillaume-Lebegue/quarkus_panache_demo_crash  
Just need to start the test class EntityTest

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Windows 11

### Output of `java -version`

Java 21.0.1

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.9.2

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

apache-maven-3.9.6

### Additional information

Also, apply if I use `delete` instead of `deleteAll`.  
Do not throw if same DataSource
